posts.title: Smartphone Thermal Imaging Camera
posts.content: No one can hide from the lens of the smartphone thermal imaging camera. Once mounted on your smartphone, this 384×288 pixel resolution camera is capable of detecting a human being up to 1600 feet away in total darkness.

posts.title: LED Wine Bottle Lamp Set
posts.content: Give your home bar an enchanting nighttime ambiance using this LED wine bottle lamp set. Each glass bottle comes stuffed with battery operated string lights that create a unique glow depending on the color of each glass bottle.

posts.title: Compostable Self-Feeding Garden Pot
posts.content: Help your garden flourish with life by planting your seedlings inside these compostable self-feeding garden pots. These biodegradable eco-friendly pots come with specialized plant food built into the walls so your plant is constantly provided with nutrients.

posts.title: Pokemon Uno
posts.content: Two of your favorite card games have joined forces to create the wildly entertaining Pokemon Uno. Each card in the deck features a vivid rendering of a different Pokemon character from the show, making this deck a great gift for geeks.

posts.title: Batman Mask Wall Light
posts.content: Ensure no villains or boogie men bother your little ones throughout the night by placing this Batman mask wall light on patrol. This wall mounted light creates the illusion that the Caped Crusader has busted through the wall to check in and keep a watchful eye.

posts.title: Cast Aluminum Wood Burning Fire Pit
posts.content: Avoid hypothermia on cold nights by cozying up to this cast aluminum wood burning fire pit. Apart from its solid construction and non-rusting aluminum exterior, it features an efficient design with an ample chamber and a large stainless steel mouth screen.

posts.title: 90s Solitaire Playing Cards
posts.content: Now with these 90s solitaire playing cards you’ll be able to enjoy your favorite computer game wherever you are. Each card features the iconic and colorfully geometric design – making it a great gift for anyone looking to relive the golden era of Microsoft Windows gaming.

posts.title: Hairbrella Rain Hat
posts.content: Keep your perfectly coiffed hair from becoming a hot mess on rainy days by heading out with the Hairbrella rain hat. This fashionable and practical accessory features a lightweight waterproof microfiber exterior that shields your face and hair from the elements.

posts.title: Hands-Free Flotation Device
posts.content: Stay afloat in the water without exerting yourself by using this hands-free flotation device. Capable of holding up to 180 lbs, it’s covered in a soft water-resistant fabric that is complemented with a neoprene crotch for comfort in the loins.

posts.title: Global Warming Coffee Mug
posts.content: Give yourself a daily reminder of the impending doom our planet faces using this global warming coffee mug. The mug features a temperature reactive design that shows the catastrophic effects our planet will face when hot water is poured inside.

posts.title: Make Your Own Snow Globe Kit
posts.content: Turn your next arts and crafts project into a gorgeous gift for any loved one using this make your own snow globe kit. Intended for ages six and up, the kit includes everything from a plastic globe, polymer clay, and glitter so you can let you imagination run wild.

posts.title: Unplugged Games Book
posts.content: Count on the Unplugged Games book to keep your family entertained when the electricity goes out and civilization grinds to a halt. With over 50 fun-filled games that require no external batteries, it’ll force your kids to interact face to face.
